title: The Story of Jeans
description: Blue jeans are as American as it gets, but do you know who invented them, how they became fashionable, or how they are made? The Story of Jeans answers these questions, taking the reader from the San Francisco Gold Rush to modern-day closets.
highFrequencyWords: antique, banned, bolls, bolts, casual, custom, diagonal, indigo, linen, ore, rivets
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Commas                : Recognize and use commas in a series
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
